Accidentally downloaded the 2007 version before this one and I must say that this "remake" sucks. The only difference between this version and the other is this one has alot of cussing and very little funny. I am amazed that they didnt even change anything between the 2 versions. 

Download the 2007 version and you will enjoy the story alot more IMO.
